features: Two Packs of 2 Parodontax Complete Protection Oral Care Soft Toothbrush for Healthy Gums and Strong Teeth
Adult soft toothbrush pack with two adult compact toothbrushes that offers eight specially designed benefits for superior teeth cleaning and gum health
Works as an interdental brush that helps remove plaque and cleans along the gum line
Compact toothbrush designed to reach hard-to-clean areas for a superior cleaning that helps restore the natural color of your teeth
Ergonomic toothbrush with soft bristles that is easy to hold and gentle on your teeth and gums
body.description: Each Parodontax Complete Protection Soft Toothbrush offers eight specially designed benefits to keep your teeth and gums healthy, clean and strong. This soft bristle toothbrush delivers effective dental plaque removal, cleaning along the gum line and the interdental spaces to help restore the natural color of your teeth, while also acting as a tongue cleaner. With an ergonomic handle, this compact head toothbrush helps you reach hard-to-clean areas, providing a complete oral care solution that is easy to hold and gentle on gums and tooth enamel. This convenient Parodontax toothbrush pack comes with two soft toothbrushes for adults that allows you to replace one after three months of use. Brush your teeth with this manual toothbrush for two minutes twice daily for healthy gums and strong teeth.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Proper Brushing and Gum Health Brushing your teeth regularly is an essential part of maintaining good oral hygiene. Brushing helps remove plaque, the sticky film made up of bacteria that forms on the teeth and along the gum line. Brushing your teeth properly prevents plaque buildup, which could lead to a dental problems including cavities and red, swollen, bleeding gums—the early symptoms of gingivitis. Brushing twice a day and flossing are two of the best ways to fight against plaque. Experts recommend that you should use a soft-bristled brush which is gentler on gums and tooth enamel. parodontax toothbrush is designed to clean where plaque can build up – between your teeth, on your tongue and along your gum line. Give your mouth some extra TLC by brushing with parodontax Active Gum Repair, a toothpaste that not only fights plaque, but is also clinically proven to help reduce bleeding gums (an early sign of gum disease). And make sure to visit your dentist every six months for a professional cleaning.
Discover the 8 benefits of parodontax Complete Protection toothbrush 1. Removes plaque 2. Cleans around the gum line 3. Gentle on gums and enamel 4. Compact head for hard to reach areas
5. Interdental cleaning 6. Helps restore natural whiteness* *with twice daily brushing 7. Tongue cleaner 8. Ergonomic handle
parodontax Complete Protection Toothbrush It has 8 benefits for healthy gums and strong teeth. It is recommended you replace your toothbrush every three months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soft toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I have tried several soft micro bristles tooth brushes on amazon, and this might be the best one. Cleans well, is soft on my gums and lasts a long time without deforming. The tongue scraper on the back is not very functional, unlike the one on a colgate 360, it is hard so it rubs a lot against the cheeks making molar brushing hard. A version with a tapered end would be great for those with full sets and small mouths.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good coverage & soft bristles
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice toothbrush - bristles are soft, gentle on my teeth and gums. My teeth feel clean. I like it better than other "soft" brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My teeth feel clean and my dentist says my gums are not "torn up"
reviews.reviewText: I didn't buy them for the "plastic-less" packaging but I feel better about throwing all this "cardboard" away. Love the attention to waste and especially plastic waste. The toothbrushes are substantially plastic and that will be enough waste when I am through brushing my teeth. Love the bristles.. very soft and the shape of the brush keeps me from injuring my mouth when I use it. I really like the handle and how the brush feels in my hand. Super product, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My dentist gave me one of these toothbrushes after my cleaning and I love it!!
reviews.reviewText: It is gentle on your guns and cleans your teeth at the same time. I’ve stopped using my electric toothbrush. This is a great toothbrush!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used a lot of different brands and types of toothbrushes. This is the brand that I absolutely love!!!They are just the right size, the right shape, and just the right amount of softness/hardness. So you could say it’s the “Goldilocks” toothbrush!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good toothbrush, not too soft and not too hard. The brush head feels a little bulky but works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Very soft and easy on your gums and teeth! Highly recommend! Fast shipping and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great soft toothbrushes.
reviews.reviewText: It is easy on the gums and great for cleaning your teeth and gum lines.
